title.rendered: Value Education at Vesava Vidya Mandir School

content.rendered:
Value Education sessions were conducted at Vesava Vidya Mandir School (English Medium), at Varsova, Andheri West, Mumbai. Around 600 children from class 1st to 10th were sensitized by the CFC team including Mr. Suryakant Narvekar, Mr. Someshwar Nair and Ms. Dharati Dolariya.

Principal, Mrs. Bhageshwari Sharma, was very keen that the students be sensitized. The students, who hailed from lower middle income families, were all well behaved, well groomed and disciplined.
